hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Suhail through a different chain of narrators to the same effect. This version has :“three sisters, or three daughter, or two daughter, or two sisters”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ مَنْ عَالَ يَتَامَى
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of one who takes care of an orphan
